alert.note: Alert for Nolan; Runnels; Taylor (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Angelo (Central Texas San Angelo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 11 at 5:01PM CDT by NWS San Angelo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Nolan, southwestern Taylor and northwestern Runnels Counties through 545 PM CDT... At 500 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Wingate, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nolan, Hylton, Coronados Camp, Wingate, Happy Valley, Drasco, Pumphrey, Shep, Wilmeth and Camp Butman. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for west central Texas.
